changeSet.author: fisher
changeSet.sql: create table districts ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), primary key (id) )

changeSet.author: fisher
changeSet.sql: create table regions ( id bigint not null auto_increment, name varchar(255), district_id bigint, primary key (id), foreign key (district_id) references districts (id) );

changeSet.author: fisher
changeSet.sql: create table budgets ( amount decimal(38, 2), year integer not null, region_id bigint, id bigint not null, primary key (id), foreign key (region_id) references regions (id) );
